About the Company: Super Crop Safe Ltd is engaged in the healthcare industry for agricultural sector.The company`s product range includes various agricultural medicines like technical grade pesticides, insecticides, fungicides, weedicides and biological products.The famous brands for the above products are Nivin S-3, Hariyali Super, Sudan, SU-Copper, SU-Pride, Sudol, Sufen, Suvan, Sumida, Sumite, Suthion, Super Gold Spider, etc.
